description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database visualizer interface. It contains HTML markup, CSS styles, and JavaScript code to browse databases, tables, and display table data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list by reloading database information.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show or hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and renders data from a specific table within a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML to display data in a tabular format.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell contents, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or a truncated preview.
